website_summaries.verdict: The executive chair of comfort for home offices. Ergonomically designed for a wide variety of uses.
pros: High back support supports the head and neck while using the computer
Curved arm supports help reduce unnecessary strain
cons: Fabric can start to tear after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second one after 7 years.
customer_reviews.text: I am actually going to buy this chair a second time. After 7 years there was only minimal wear until someone MUCH too large for it sat in it for a few weeks (about 400lbs). I recommend adhering to the weight limit, otherwise the fake leather starts to peel off under the weight. But the chair itself did hold up. I'm giving it to someone who needs a chair. I really like the tilt feature and the padded arm rests (for me) are in the perfect place and are soft enough - my husbands padded arms start to hurt my elbows after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Manza

customer_reviews.title: its pretty basic. I strongly recommend this chair because even ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite what all the other reviews said, I decided to purchase this. I weight 320lbs (yes I exceed the weight limit) and am 6 foot. Yes, if you are not very handy and this is your first assembly ever then you might struggle. This is a one man job, takes 20-30 mins. The arm rests are the tricky part but after that, its pretty basic. I strongly recommend this chair because even for me (an individual exceeding the weight limit by 70 pounds) it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Executive Comfort
customer_reviews.text: During the COVID-19 pandemic my at home office chair broke -- the center post went through the base so the chair would not slide -- I ordered this chair -- it did take a bit longer to arrive ONLY because shipping was for essential items but it certainly did come quickly. I put it together while working (call center -- taking calls) so it was easy to put together considering I was multi-tasking. I should have purchased a chair much much much sooner! I highly recommend this chair -- great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good seat, too bad it doesn't recline. Otherwise, it's a great chair. Plenty of padding, and comfortable. Definitely worth the price. Putting it together isn't too bad. I would suggest putting the chair part first, then the bottom parts with the piston. You may need a friend to help hold the back, but I was able to get it myself.
customer_reviews.author: James Havard

customer_reviews.title: Could do better with the screws and the holes.
customer_reviews.text: Current - With minimal use for the past few months this chair started leaning and the screws are not able to stay in place. First Experience- No instructions. The holes were not aligned to fit the screws properly, i had to force the screws in an angle to get them in. I may return it if the chair shows any signs of handle bar weakness, because of the way i had to force the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy chair!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for the price, but was impressed at how great the chair looked, and how comfortable it was. However, only after 2 weeks of use, it has developed extremely loud snapping/popping creaks! Especially when leaning upright/forward in the chair. I use this chair daily for computer use, and I find it rather annoying while using my microphone. Also, if the company changed it's seat cushion mounting bracket to a wider quality, lesser wobbly, and quiet one, I would've paid ten more dollars for this chair. ($160.00) To get rid of the creaking noise, you have to apply some oil to each of the main mounting screws that attach to the bottom of the seat cushion
customer_reviews.author: scotchrks

customer_reviews.title: Useless customer service
customer_reviews.text: Decent chair - for awhile. Then the left arm snapped where it bolts to the base, rendering the whole chair crooked and unstable. Contacted the company to see if they sold replacements parts. I was hoping they did, I didn't want to junk the chair just because one part of it broke. All I wanted was a yes or no. They were completely unresponsive and about as useless as this chair. Won't buy another Boss product.
customer_reviews.author: Djj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Although this chair looks great and is very comfortable, I would have to say that the assembling was a major problem. I own a large number of tools and and consider myself quite DIY handy still had trouble putting the chair together. The problems arose in joining the arms to the back part of the chair and took me over an hour to actually finish assembling it. For anyone who is not used to DIY, I think they would struggle putting the chair together. Other than that though, once the chair was assembled, it looks great. Just be prepared to spend quite a long time getting to this point first.
customer_reviews.author: Swainy1

customer_reviews.title: It wont fit back through my door
customer_reviews.text: I dont love this chair, it doesnt feel like its secure in place. I had a terrible time getting it together the right arm would not fit into place. Its not terrible but not a chair that is comfortable for longer than an hour or so and not one you can relax and sit back in. I feel like while sitting in it I cant lean back or it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ralston

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Ordered on May 10, 2015. Broke on October 23, 2015. I am very unhappy with this item. Feels just as cheap as your 100 dollar realspace soho from office depot. definitely had screw alignment issues as most other reviews stated. the screwhole covers fall out, too. there is a distinct lean when the chair is upright and locked. My advice is to tighten all screws with a screwdriver, then take a seat in it and lean back to let it 'stretch' out a bit, then use a ratcheting chuck drill to get the screws in fully. not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lol it's six

customer_reviews.title: A bit rickety
customer_reviews.text: I sit all day some days at the office. Cons: "high back" provides no real neck support for basically standard height male (6'1") Leans too far back Feels cheaply made and I expect it to break within a year due to me leaning back too far (see above) Pros: Soft "leather" Height adjustment has more than expected range Doesn't creak and groan when used My employee put this together for me (thanks!). However, it really required additional tightening with a socket wrench than possible with included tools. Said tightening greatly decreased the wobbliness.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Baner

customer_reviews.title: Here goes..
customer_reviews.text: One word.. AWESOME!!! I just finished putting it together. HUGE HUGE hint, hook the arms to the back of the chair FIRST then to the seat. THEN set the whole assembly onto the base. Do it that way as you will NOT fight it. This chair is so comfy!!! It's wide so your hips dont touch and long so you aren't slipping out of it. Just the way I like it. You could fall asleep in it easily. I'm 5'8ish and my head lays perfectly against the back. The leather is also SOFT. Not that cheap hard stuff everyone else has. I totally give this chair a 10!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: i love my new Boss back executive chair , pillow pewter finished
customer_reviews.text: this chair come packaged real good , it was not too much trouble to put together, the chair was priced right, and i used my computer a lot and this chair is comfortable, it has enought padding and for the price a great chair, i like it better than any chair i ever owned, most computer chairs after you set in them over three hours you get real tired this one you don,'t the chair appearance is pretty , it looks like it would have cost four hundred dollars, mine chair was only 149$ thanks amazon for great products and your fine shipping standards
customer_reviews.author: Plow Boy

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions
customer_reviews.text: Assembly: Chair was reasonable compared to other computer chairs I've assembled (10-15 minutes tops). Just needs a screw driver for the 12 screws. Looks: Chair looks great, a little taller than I had imagined. I really like it though. Feel: The cushion is firm. It gives the visual impression that it is just going to sink in and hug your body, but it is actually fairly supportive. Don't get me wrong, it's soft but not like a pillow. Arm rests are nicely padded. I'm very happy with the overall feel. I spend many hours a day in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mizyke

customer_reviews.title: The chair does not sit level. It has a ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair does not sit level. It has a different set of holes on the bottom of the seat suggesting to me it was re-drilled for this issue. THe screws where in a "zip-lock" baggie. I think it was sent back and then they repacked and sent to me. I should have sent it back. but I missed placed the packing slips and did not have the box. Very disappointing. My loss- there financial gain.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The chair has no lumbar support. When you sit down straight there is a 8 to 10 inches before your back rests on the chair. You will need to buy something to bridge the gap or use a big blanket. It feels like you are going to lay back instead of siitting. Not happy at all with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and not worth the frustration.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for less than a week and it's already leaning to the left, crackling and popping every time I sit in it and terribly uncomfortable. The actual stem of the chair feels as though it's going to come through the seat itself. I put it together perfectly fine, that part was a no brainer. Worst purchase of the year from Amazon. Unfortunately I tossed the box early on due to its size and now I have no way of sending it back..I'll toss it and go buy a new one locally.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little more cushy on the bum. but its a very nice chair! and very quick and easy to put together. Use an electric screw driver, I put mine together in 10mins
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Its been a great office chair so far! It's very comfortable and great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Good mix of price, durability, and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to buy another one of these guys after owning one for almost 7 years. The "leather" material is peeling and doesn't look very nice anymore, but the chair is still incredibly comfortable; it survived a lot of use and abuse - daily 3+ hour gaming and work sessions, at least 4 moves.
customer_reviews.author: Spacepope

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for awhile but it’s not very durable. Expect to replace it relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a few years and already the hydrolic mechanism for th chair stopped working right. Keeps lowering all the way down I have to keep bringing it back up. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: K. T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Spouse likes them. I would have liked more support in the middle of my back.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The holes are not properly aligned and a screw holding the right armrest would not go into the hole resulting in a torn up screw and hole in the armrest and you do not get an extra.
customer_reviews.author: RonH

customer_reviews.title: Awful chair that is almost impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: The arms are used to hold together the seat and back and are tiny little screws that make it impossible to put together. The holes don't line up at all. Took my 2 hours to put it together and I am a whiz with this kinda stuff. Once together, the chair feels like it's going to fall apart any minute. UPDATE: A year later and the chair is still holding up just fine. Perhaps I was too harsh... so I've increased the stars to three. However, it was still impossible to put together!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: 8 months, still holds up great
customer_reviews.text: i have had this chair since late December and it still holds up great! for the price i expected maybe 4-5 months before something went wrong, but surprisingly the only issue is that it creaks a tad when i roughly sit down but thats to be expected. if you are on a budget for a comfy chair that lasts, then this might be one of the best options for under 150$
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: but after you get it all done its a great chair. I use it daily and love it
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily, putting it together was a bit of a challenge, but after you get it all done its a great chair. I use it daily and love it. Gives great back support. I am a big guy 200+ pounds and this chair is a life saver for those long gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein J Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a nice chair to replace my old one that had recently ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice chair to replace my old one that had recently gone flat in the seat. This chair is great! The back support is perfect! I often spend hours playing computer games, and so far have never gotten up out of the chair with a sore back. It took me less than an hour to put together by myself. These chairs are always a little difficult to put together, but as long as you put the screws in just a little, and tighten as you go, it isn't that bad. I highly suggest you buy this chair. The price was right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boss High Back Executive Chair with Pillow top Pewter Finished Base
customer_reviews.text: My husband finds this chair very comfortable . The curved arms make it easy to sit closer to the desk. The height adjustment is great. It is just an all over comfortable chair at a decent price. Although the only problem we had was assembling the chair with no instructions...that was very frustrating, but once we finally had it together, it has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rosmary Nuss

customer_reviews.title: It is (just) ok
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable and solid. The assembly is NOT easy. By the time I got it assembled, I needed the chair to take a rest. None of the screw holes wanted to line up and the assembly instructions didn't help. Such a simple process should not be THAT difficult. By the way, this was not my first rodeo. These problems were unexpected and unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S.

customer_reviews.title: Sucks..
customer_reviews.text: Chair is OK for comfort, but after 6 months of sitting in it the shock absorber / lift leaks. It will sometimes lower itself while I'm sitting in it. Not all at once but a fraction of the height every 10secofns or so. I'm constantly readjusting the hieght over the day. Sucks...
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Vega

customer_reviews.title: The chair is difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Some of the screws are in so tight it takes a lot of torque to remove. I had one screw chip before it loosened up. Other screws that where removed don't go back in correctly during assembly. The good news is it isn't likely for some the screws to come out because they are forced in. I think its just very poor quality control. I would not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is a blessing!
customer_reviews.text: The chair I ordered was a Christmas Present to my housemate. She suffers from lower back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain and suffers from chronic arthritis and bursitis. Since I've bought the chair, she put it together and she says it feels as though she's sitting on a cloud. It's not going to heal her aches and pains, but it sure helps tolerate them. She's very pleased with her new chair. She recommends it highly to anyone who's looking for a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: George H Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable! Until it falls apart.....
customer_reviews.text: Well, for starters this chair was NOT easy to assemble. I saw a post on here claiming it was and that person must have had 8 arms. It's a 2 person job, period. As for comfortably, it is very comfortable. Great for hours of sitting....until it gets to be a year or two old. The arms stripped out as dis the back as the arms went. For the price I was very disappointed. My advice is buy a chair further up the Amazon rankings. There is a reason this one is 45th.
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: fairly comfortable but leans back to a scary degree and hurts ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this chair for about a year now, it came fast and was as expected to put together. but after the first few months the chair started to slowly fall apart. A screw snapped earlier today and now the chair is crooked and unusable. fairly comfortable but leans back to a scary degree and hurts my back after an hour of sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Rin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair two days ago in excellent shape and in an expeditious manner. Assembly was five steps, 20 minutes. Chair is of sturdy construction and good quality materials. Soft leather-like feel and strikingly expensive appearance. Pillowtop back and seat are very comfortable with the ample lumbar support being an added benefit. Good price. Five stars.............Nice Chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting yours in working condition.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with the screws in so tight that it was obvious the assembler had actually stripped the screws during initial assembly. Thus I wasn't actually even able to get two of the screws to function normally despite full power settings on my own drill and ended up with a dangerously loose product that, upon my first attempt sitting on it, a screw popped out! Needless to say, highly unimpressed. Other cons: Low weight limit Can't lean back in the chair without running the risk of breaking it. Not worth the money, I've seen a one hundred dollar chair more sturdy and functional than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: like it very much
customer_reviews.text: like it very much, is soft and nice looking only thing that i dont like: I thought it will be bigger. is easy to install but the screw doesnt go in very well. So, i had to put some force to make it work. overall great for the price
customer_reviews.author: mwang

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong the chair is great. Comfortable and executive looking
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong the chair is great. Comfortable and executive looking. However, the instructions for putting it together are lacking a lot. We also had a issue attaching the arm rest to the chair. We almost stripped the screws trying to get the arms attached. They had to be placed just right in order to go into the back and seat of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: robert potts

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad chair
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a job where I work from home and I needed a new chair without spending a fortune. I am 5'9 and I won't lie very hippy and bootylicious. I wish there was a little more padding, but the lumbar support allows me to sit correctly! I like this chair! Stylish and sleek,more padding in the seating would be great, but I like this chair!
customer_reviews.author: citygirl81

customer_reviews.title: It's A Chair
customer_reviews.text: PROS - It's cushy, has decent lumbar support, and looks nice. CONS - A bit wobbly, recline spring doesn't get as tight as i'd like, seat back not as high as i'd like. It's a functional office chair, and so far is fairly cushy. Questionable quality therefore questionable longevity. probably more of an $70 chair than the ~$130.00 I paid. Expected more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks nice, but seat cushion is flat with little support. Has about as much padding as the old chair that I was replacing it with. In fact, I prefer my old and flat chair to this one. Regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ARB

customer_reviews.title: I bought this chair thinking that it looked comfortable. That is not the case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair thinking that it looked comfortable. That is not the case. This is the most uncomfortable chair I have ever had. Fortunately it was easy to put together, because now I am taking it back apart and sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: No Public Name

customer_reviews.title: From Riches to Rags
customer_reviews.text: I buy this chair every single year for the past 5 years. It sits so well on my back etc, its the perfect chair other than the pleather falls apart every year and looks hideous.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tony

customer_reviews.title: Screws wouldn't go in. Stripped.
customer_reviews.text: The chair seems to be overall pretty nice. I ordered two different chairs and they ended up being equally comfortable. However, this chair had issues getting the arms connected to the chair. The screws would not go in nicely at all. It ended up stripping and now the chair is junk unless I find a way to retap the holes and get new screws. FYI - the cheaper chair I got went together a lot nicer. Kind of ironic.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Meiners

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quckly
customer_reviews.text: This product was flimsy and broke within two months of ordering and assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Klaben

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for one of my staff members, for the price you cant go wrong. It is probably one of the most comfortable chairs I have ever sat in. It was very easy to assemble, just took a few minutes. I would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: poor quality hardware
customer_reviews.text: Package received, put together, screw broke off and is stripped, therefore back of chair will fall out if you recline. Unhappy, very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: This my favorite gift that I have given to my husband, the chair is so comfortable and its relaxing as well. Very smooth and has great support, if I could I would take it to work
customer_reviews.author: Hadil

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it. Assembly was kinda annoying
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. Assembly was kinda annoying. Thankfully my brother helped me. The cushioning was great and everyone complimented on how soft it felt. Unfortunately the thing holding the wheels broke. I recommend something that uses actual metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair, while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the chair for the first 9 or so months, then it started falling apart. By about the 1 year mark, I had to throw it away. So, not the worst thing in the world, it was nice for a year, but for the price point, seems like it should be a lot sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Channell

customer_reviews.title: Put together easily, very professional looking
customer_reviews.text: Put together easily, very professional looking. Comfortable as well however it wobbles a little side to side when you sit on it. Almost likes its loose on the base. Gonna try reseating some screws but otherwise very awesome chair.
customer_reviews.author: CommonJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Smooth, and Good-Looking
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly easy, but like other reviewers stated, the screws were a bit of a challenge to insert and get working properly. Sometimes they would catch fibers from the chair and would prevent the screw from going in further, other times they would misalign and would go in about 1/5 of the way before stopping. I only had this problem multiple times with 2 screws; after that I was a bit more careful and the installation process was much smoother. Sitting in the chair is a pleasant experience. The rollers are smooth and it leans back at a comfortable angle. I am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Justesen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair, my only complaint is the screws used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair, my only complaint is the screws used to put it together are Phillips head and it takes a lotr of p[atience to put this chair together. screws should have been hexed or allen wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R.

customer_reviews.title: easy was to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy was to assemble, it is comfortable to sit on. BUT, the tilting support is noisy: when I move side to side it clicks, when I rock back it creaks, which is loud enough to be a be concerning. I e-mailed the manufacturer "Boss" with NO response Sam
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rau

customer_reviews.title: "BOSS" is the Boss
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby who is no light weight. Took him about 5 minutes to put this together. Made with heavy duty materials to host a heavy duty person.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: He liked it just fine until the screws in the arms ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. The screw on one side was difficult to put in, but we got it together. He liked it just fine until the screws in the arms started falling out and breaking. I bought this May 14th of 2014, and it is broken and completely unusable as of today... I would save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Office Chair? Get Out Of Here!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfortable that I just don't see it being associated with office work or stress! Unless you're trying to fall asleep at the office. I love it as much as a recliner chair. It is perfect for my studio sessions when you may be sitting for some time. This is the best chair out there for this price, and especially for this category. Save your back a whole lot of misery by purchasing this chair. And if you do get one for the office, try not to look too comfortable when the boss comes around! Good luck with that one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time at my computer through out the day and this chair is plenty comfortable. It is stylish and seems sturdy. The only problem I had was lining up all the screws to put it together. Overall, I am happy I bought it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KellyQ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable BUT Felt Like I Was Going to Slide Off
customer_reviews.text: The picture looked great! The high backrest was awesome! But the seat seemed toooo small. I like to slouch when I sit and kept feeling like I was going to slide out of the seat. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: Substitute for kitchen chairs
customer_reviews.text: We gave this a 4 instead of 5 because they are a bit larger than needed. My wife and I use these around a kitchen island and really like them because of the comfort. An added bonus is they can be wiped clean.
customer_reviews.author: William H Dierking

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this chair looks and I thought assembly would be easy. Oh how I was wrong. It was a bit complicated to get the screws off the chair. Thew screws come on the chair pre installed but you have to remove them to install arms. They were extremely tight and was not easy to remove off chair. Also the chair is not comfortable as it looks. If i had to rate on a scale of 10 of comfortableness i would say its a 5. 139.99 is way to much for this chair. I would say its worth half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Perez

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy........
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy I really wish I had paid closer attention to the other reviews. 1) Screws will not line up. 2) Finish on parts scratches with the slights touch. 3) Parts are CHEAP CHEAP plastic. 4) Arrived with plastic parts already broken... In short do NOT buy this chair the only nice thing about it is the leather...
customer_reviews.author: Mark mason

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable and soft. It's not super cushion-y, but it has a nice, "firm" comfort that I like. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because it was a PAIN to assemble. I had read other reviews about the difficult assembly prior to purchasing and thought, "How hard could it be?" Trust me, it's challenging. Unless you align the screws perfectly straight (which is difficult enough), they will not go in. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Rockness

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, my boyfriend assembled for me. He says fitting screws can be difficult as the leather can interfere with the screw fit, would have been easier if eyelets were fitted on screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: Shizuyo  Ito

customer_reviews.title: Boss Indeed
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It was easy to assemble, although the last screw seemed a bit misplaced. It may have been my fault. But I love this chair. It's extreme comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Symone

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and nice looking. My stepdad had to put it together as all the pieces were separate. The only thing is after a month it is super creaky or else I am really fat. But it's rude of the chair to complain either way.
customer_reviews.author: Shaquita

customer_reviews.title: Assembly might be difficult, but great chair after that!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly isn't that easy. Received one that was defective with a bent bolt and stripped inner bolts. The replacement wasn't lined up with the inner bolts on the arm rest and the seat back, but was able to get it to squeeze in. Once assembled, it's a pretty comfortable chair, there just might be draw backs on the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: cag3287

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad and was easy to put together. the price point was good but would not want to pay more. No real cons excpet I had a hard time trying to find a seat cushion with good comfort at a good price. this one is okay for me. I am not big or heavy... so i am not a super size user. if I were maybe you would want a chair with more cushion. Update... I gave this chair away. It had no last to it. The seat cushion was really not good for extended periods of time sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D Rudek

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for about one month so far. It was easy to assemble. It's super comfortable with great lumbar support. The vinyl is soft and feels upscale. It's not totally obvious from the picture--the trim is gray with metallic flakes. The chair looks great in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Home Office Chair
customer_reviews.text: - plenty of bang for your buck! - I've owned a lot of chairs for home office use, here are a couple of the pro's: great lumbar support, good back support, and not stingy on the cushioning! I would highly recommend this chair to anyone looking for an affordable home office chair. Incidentally don't let the price fool you, this same chair is being sold (marked up of course) at plenty of furniture stores for $100 more. By skipping the middle man you get a great chair for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph La Fave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review from my room, currently sitting on this very comfortable chair. I bought it a few months ago, about 5 months ago, it is very comfortable and I have had no problems with it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Marte

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to spend much time looking for an office chair. I saw some previous reviews of this chair and it looked perfect for me. I chose it because I don't want to be too stingy and get a crappy chair. I think the price is reasonable and I got the chair quickly (before the expected date). My husband and I spent time assembling it together. I am happy with this chair. We got some confusion about the air-pressure adjustment part. We figured out that we needed to removed the cap but the instruction did not say it.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair
customer_reviews.text: Received today and assembled in 15 minutes. It was very easy. The chair looks great, it is very comfortable, very soft, very solid and has a good lumbar support. What more you want from a chair. But i have to admit that the price is a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Apoc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible construction and not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible construction and not comfortable at all. Amazon was nice enough to refund my money immediately. Couldn't even dissemble the chair to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brooke Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable, and better built than similarly priced chairs. Cons: A bit of a pain to assemble the arms and back. They could do something to keep the material from getting binding while inserting the screws...
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Look no further for another chair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sitting in the chair while writing this! The assembly was extremely easy! Excellent quality! Really confortable! Fast shipping! Awesome price! I couldn't ask for more! If your looking for a nice office chair, look no further! Thanks guys! You just made another happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric King

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Quality than Cheaper Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this chair for a few days but I think it was a wise purchase. It shipped faster than expected and assembly was easier than expected. I was able to put together within 30 minutes. Quality is excellent for the price. Great cushions on arms,seat and back. Great back support for someone with a bad back. It seems that it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Wertz

customer_reviews.title: defective part or ?
customer_reviews.text: after 2 weeks, while i was leaning back, the caster exploded out of the base sending me to the floor. hopefully there was a flaw/weakness in the base unit and not a design flaw. i weigh 185lbs
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: very comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: the chair arrived four days before the stated delivery date and was relatively easy to assemble. the chair is very comfortable and feels like it will last just as long as our previous one, which was probably way longer than it should have been. overall, fast shipping and great product.
customer_reviews.author: calicojane

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately spend a lot of time at my office desk. This chair has been great. It's large sturdy design is very accomidating and its high back provides full comfort for your entire back and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: It works fow what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: Well I finally got my chair, which is really comfortable. The only thing i am disappointed is that it looks like i got pieces of different chairs. And the back piece looks to be badly stitched. But besides the fact that i will not be showing it off, it serves it's purpose as a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair in good time. It was a challenge putting it together by myself. When it was all together and I sat in it for the first time I was disappointed. It was not as soft as it looks in the pictures. Very stiff. Not as high back as expected. However, the more I sat in it the more I came to like and enjoy it. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like leaning to the side...
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to get screws to align. Pretty sure that the screw posts were not machined properly on one side of my chair. Would be a great chair if not for this fatal flaw which left me with a chair that leans to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit tricky to attach the arms to the seat and seat back. I found it easier to connect the arms to the seat back first and then attach the chair. The screws were a bit difficult to get the threads started but it all went to gether relatively simple.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Huey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, spend extra bit of money to buy a better chair.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow top is very thin, the screws never lined up for the arm chair. After hard use and little over 8 months, the wheels have been breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to assemble, and had a "plastic" smell at first, but has turned out to be a fantastic purchase, nice chair!
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair 3 years ago, still have it, nothing broken, still comfy chair was easy to assemble and worth the $140 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaciouss

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. It's a really nice chair. He's in it a lot....computer games, very comfortable, well padded
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: SOFT
customer_reviews.text: It fixed my back pain from sitting to long at the computer
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The boss chair is nice. It has good cushions on it. But it does not say the weight limit for it on the add, The weight limit is 250 pounds
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Words won't describe what a terrible chair this is. Sent it back as you couldn't put it together . Screws would not line up so chair wouldn't stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hallenbeck

customer_reviews.title: ... out they sent me a new back and its better so
customer_reviews.text: had to replace the back after a short time screws wont stay tight and stripped out they sent me a new back and its better so far
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Hemi

customer_reviews.title: Bad Construction
customer_reviews.text: Terrible chair. It sits at an angle 2yrs after i bought it. Not even comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winfield

customer_reviews.title: It's quick delivery but chair not recommend to my friend
customer_reviews.text: It's quick delivery but chair not recommend to my friend. because so hard screw it and not comfortable seat. I bought 4 different chair before this is a worst one. All frames are cheap finish about that value. My $69 chair is a lot better than this. Anyway I regret bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll have to get used to readjusting the chair, ...
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to get used to readjusting the chair, as it likes to lower randomly, but hasn't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lessi

customer_reviews.title: OK but built cheep
customer_reviews.text: The arm broke within a few months but it is still usable. The padding didn't last long before going flat.
customer_reviews.author: alan jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable and not too hard to put together, I think it is great! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, it takes a while to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Need 2 people to put together or else you'll struggle. Very comfortable. I've only had it a few months so I can't speak on the longevity yet. It does feel very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Amy G. Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk chair
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good price, very comfy chair! Easy to assemble. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hannamaker

product_meta.title: Boss Office Products B9331 High Back Executive Chair with Pewter Finsh in Black
product_meta.description: High back. Beautifully upholstered in Black CaressoftPlus. Pillow top cushions for added comfort. Padded arm rests. Adjustable tile tension control. Pneumatic gas lift seat height adjustment. Large 27" nylon base with black caps. Hooded double wheel casters.
feature_bullets: Pillow top cushions for added comfort
Pillow top cushions for added comfort.
Pneumatic gas lift seat height adjustment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars292 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
